# Resource (hush_mysql_access_privilege)

Manage MySQL access privileges in the Hush Security platform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a MySQL access privilege
resource "hush_mysql_access_privilege" "example" {
  name        = "app-read-write"
  description = "Read/write access to application tables"

  grants {
    privileges    = ["SELECT", "INSERT", "UPDATE"]
    resource_type = "table"
    resource_names = ["users", "orders"]
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `grants` (Block List, Min: 1) The list of privilege grants (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--grants))
- `name` (String) The name of the MySQL access privilege

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the MySQL access privilege

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the MySQL access privilege
- `type` (String) The type of access privilege

<a id="nestedblock--grants"></a>
### Nested Schema for `grants`

Required:

- `privileges` (List of String) The list of MySQL privileges (e.g., SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE)
- `resource_type` (String) The type of resource (database or table)

Optional:

- `resource_names` (List of String) The names of the resources
